mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_REAL_FEED (ID, MEMBER_ID, PLAN_ID) VALUES(#{id}, #{memberId}, #{planId})
mapper.select: SELECT f.ID, f.FEED_CONTENT, f.CREATED_DATE, f.UPDATED_DATE, r.MEMBER_ID, r.PLAN_ID FROM TBL_FEED f JOIN TBL_REAL_FEED r ON f.ID = r.ID
SELECT f.ID, f.FEED_CONTENT, f.CREATED_DATE, f.UPDATED_DATE, r.MEMBER_ID, r.PLAN_ID FROM TBL_FEED f JOIN TBL_REAL_FEED r ON f.ID = r.ID WHERE r.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT f.ID, f.FEED_CONTENT, f.CREATED_DATE, f.UPDATED_DATE, r.MEMBER_ID, r.PLAN_ID FROM TBL_FEED f JOIN TBL_REAL_FEED r ON f.ID = r.ID WHERE f.ID = #{id}
